To God_is_real:
 As you will find out when you read the message I sent you this morning, no I am not a pastor. I am a student just finishing school. However, I wouldn't mind being a Minister for the Salvation Army or something like that if I feel "the Call". I would perfer to become a scientist however. It is like what our last Corps Officer (not Corpse!!!) said:
 "If you want to make God laugh, tell Him your plans for your life".
 Well, the "Man Upstairs" must be having a little bit of a giggle right now...
So why exactly did you post this in a debate FORUM?? Why can't you just send him a private message?

title: 4Forums.com Political Debates and Polls -  Nu leader
